This is the website for Indian School Al Ghubra, a school primarily meant for the children of Indian expatriates living in Oman.

patterns: what is the use of this place?
responses: This is the website for Indian School Al Ghubra. Over here you'll find real time updates about everything which happens in school, you'll be able to contact teachers and pretty much do anything related to this school
This site and I, were made by three developers whose names even I don't know.

patterns: what do you do the whole day
responses: There's actually quite a lot I can do, at least regarding this site. I can help you navigate almost everywhere, get you in contact with the school officials, help you register, help students who come here, take you to fun games my creator made, and even make jokes!
Yes! Please tell me what you require assistance for

patterns: i want to register my child to this school
i want to admit my child into isg
i want my child to join this school
how to admission in indian school al ghubra
how to get admission in isg
how do you get into isg
responses: Registration for admission to ISG starts from January 2021. A non- refundable fee of OMR 15 will be payable on each application. Here's the link from where you can submit the admission form and get more information - ###Registration

patterns: what is the location of isg?
responses:
ISG is located in Al-Ghubra, Muscat, in the Sultanate of Oman
###

responses: Sure! Roundsquare is an international organization of schools which aims to increase unity and instill a sense of internationalism in the students of these institutions. You can find a lot more about roundsquare on their official website, or you could find ISG's role in it at this link - ###Our role in Roundsquare

patterns: can you tell me some jokes
hit me with your best jokes
i want to hear some jokes
responses:
Did you hear about the actor who fell through the floorboards?
He was just going through a stage.

Did you hear about the claustrophobic astronaut?
He just needed a little space.

Why did the chicken go to the seance?
To get to the other side.

Where are average things manufactured?
The satisfactory.

How do you drown a hipster?
Throw him in the mainstream.

What's the best thing about Switzerland?
I don't know, but the flag is a big plus.

I invented a new word!
Plagiarism!

Did you hear about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers?
He'll stop at nothing to avoid them.

Why do we tell actors to 'break a leg?'
Because every play has a cast.

Helvetica and Times New Roman walk into a bar.
'Get out of here!', shouts the bartender.
'We don't serve your type.'

Hear about the new restaurant called Karma?
There's no menu: You get what you deserve.
